description: This file defines functions for managing 'Card' entities in a Kanban board application, including creating, updating, deleting, loading, and moving cards, with data stored in IndexedDB.

methods.name: generateId
methods.description: Generates a unique identifier based on current timestamp and random string.

methods.name: createCard
methods.description: Creates a new card object with provided data, assigns a unique ID, and saves it to IndexedDB.

methods.name: updateCard
methods.description: Updates an existing card with new data and updates the timestamp.

methods.name: deleteCard
methods.description: Deletes a card by ID from IndexedDB.

methods.name: loadCards
methods.description: Loads all cards for a specific column, sorted by position.

methods.name: loadCard
methods.description: Loads a single card by ID.

methods.name: moveCard
methods.description: Moves a card to a different column and position, updating its data.
